about_the_game:
Animaze Pro 2024 DLC is a historical snapshot of 2024 Animaze that grants a license for perpetual use of all current (2024) Animaze features for a one-time payment. This includes:

  • Ability to remove the watermark

  • Support for Webcam-based hand tracking

  • Animaze Virtual Camera refresh rate increased to 60 FPS

  • Dedicated render window, with Spout2 support and true alpha channel.

  • Unlimited Twitch Actions

  • Access all paid Animaze content, including avatars, backgrounds, props, and more, making the content pool as big as:

    • 90+ customizable avatars

    • 37+ customizable backgrounds

    • 95+ customizable accessories

  • Pro-Streamer commercial rights for streamers earning $500+ per month/$6000 + per year

  • Access to select Holotech Originals content sources of your choice, enabling you to modify the original avatar/background/prop to better complement your identity (up to 2 avatars, 5 accessories, 2 backgrounds and 3 emotes).

    Animaze Pro 2024 DLC also grants you as a bonus all new content and feature updates up to the end of 2024.

Starting with November 2024, the default face (and hands) tracker for Animaze is the popular Media Pipe tracker. This DLC does not include a perpetual license for the optional Visage Technologies face tracker that was used in the past.

BUY ONCE, USE FOREVER

Animaze Pro 2024 is the DLC that will help you create the digital identity you’ve always wanted in just a few clicks and it’s available as a one-time payment exclusively through Steam. This is the buy-once-use-forever version of the Animaze Pro Subscription, and it offers you all finalized features and content, released from the start of Animaze up to November 2024.

BE YOUR OWN VIRTUAL CHARACTER

Transform yourself into the best virtual character using the Animaze Pro 2024! With this one-time payment product, you will have access to all the tools you need to video chat, host, make awesome video content, and live stream as incredible 3D, 2D, hybrid, VRM, and ReadyPlayerMe avatars. You can choose from an extensive list of original avatars or even import your own. Customize your avatar and add props or backgrounds to create your own unique setup. Animaze is the character creator for your online self!

CUSTOMIZATION & EXPRESSION

Choose from a vast array of original base models or build your own using our in-app character creator. Select from a wide range of animals, objects, and human avatars. Add props, backgrounds, and emotes. Before you know it, you’ve got a custom virtual character ready to go!

CONNECT IN MINUTES

Get up and running with your very own digital avatar quickly and easily. After an initial setup, Animaze works with webcams or iPhones and is compatible with OBS, SLOBS, Discord, Zoom, Google Meetings, and more!

IMPORT YOUR OWN Live2D, VRM, Ready Player Me and Union Avatars Models

Already have a model? Use our guides to convert and import your models into Animaze. Importing Live2D, VRM, Ready Player Me, and Union Avatars avatars into Animaze is easy, just drag and drop them into the Animaze window or go to the Avatar Gallery and click the + button.

ENDLESS CUSTOMIZATIONS

Animaze connects with additional trackers including Leap Motion’s Ultraleap, audio-based lip trackers, and Tobii Eye Trackers. Your virtual character (who-or-whatever they look like) accurately represents the emotions you are looking to portray.

ROBUST TOOLS FOR ARTISTS

Use the Animaze Editor and comprehensive documentation to turn your 2D and 3D models into avatars, props, and backgrounds. Then, share them with the creator community! The Animaze Editor is our free authoring tool that makes sure the assets you share (.avatar files) cannot be reverse-engineered by parties with malicious intent (assets theft, non-consented AI training, etc.).

NOTE ON USING ANIMAZE YEARLY HISTORICAL DLCS

Up until ~November 2025, when you install Animaze Pro 2024, it will seamlessly integrate with your Live Service version of the app. This means that all your personalized items (customized avatars, imported avatars, quick scenes, twitch actions, etc.) and settings (overrides, tracker configs, etc.) from your Live Service version will be retained.

After November 2025, when the equivalent Animaze 2025 DLC will also be live, Animaze 2024 will will remain available via its own separate offline executable and data folders. It will no longer have any overlaps with the Live Service version, and it will run without a need to connect to any Animaze servers. From that moment on, to use your historical DLC license, when starting up Animaze you will have to choose to start "Animaze 2024" in the Steam launch settings, otherwise you will start the present-day Live Service version.

To learn how to migrate all your settings and personalized items to a new location, please visit our website, and look up the migration article in the FAQ version.

Join our Discord Server to get all the latest news and updates directly from our team.
